data.eml:eml: A new species of the spider genus Xenonemesia Goloboff and first record of X. platensis Goloboff from Brazil (Araneae, Mygalomorphae, Microstigmatidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Indicatti, Rafael Prezzi, Lucas, Sylvia Marlene, Brescovit, Antonio Domingos (2007): A new species of the spider genus Xenonemesia Goloboff and first record of X. platensis Goloboff from Brazil (Araneae, Mygalomorphae, Microstigmatidae). Zootaxa 1485: 43-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.273785
